title: pdfmake Essentials: Tips and Tricks for Getting Started
desc: Find a collection of tips and tricks for getting started with pdfmake, from setting up your development environment to building your first PDF. You'll learn how to create tables, images, and other elements in your PDFs, and how to style them to make them look great.

videos.title: Eps #01 - Getting Started, Installation and Playground Setup locally
Eps #02 - Text, Page Dimensions, Background and Sample PDF

title: Python for Beginners: Learn, Build, Test, Repeat
desc: Learn the fundamentals of Python, including its syntax, data types, and control structures. You'll also explore how to build real-world applications using Python, and how to test them to ensure their functionality.

videos.title: Simplify Your Code with Unpacking/Spread Operator
Revolutionise Your Python Code with Dictionaries
Working with JSON and Data types
Flask - REST API - GET, POST Method
Web Developer to Full Stack Developer (#10 steps)
